name: Robinson Crusoe
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-16.png)

Robinson Crusoe marked each day he lived on the island with an 'I' notch on a tree.

He already had a string of `days' consisting of many 'sticks': "IIIIIII....III".

Today Robinson added another one.


Create a `days` variable with the value `IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII` (24 days).

Write a command that modifies the string `days` by adding another letter `'I'` to it.


A similar example:
```javascript
let cars = 'III';
cars = cars + 'I';
```
